definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: Terry's reward: a silver cup - full of lettuce leaves.
sentences.chinese: 特里得到一个装满生菜叶的银杯作为奖励。

sentences.english: Joseph's sliver cup was put in one of his brothers food sacks.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟的银杯被放在他兄弟的其中一个粮袋里。

sentences.english: He present a silver cup to the winner.
sentences.chinese: 他把银杯颁给了获胜者。

sentences.english: The plastic and the silver cups are theirs.
sentences.chinese: 塑料杯和银杯都是他们的。

sentences.english: He was hurled out  of the hotel for stealing a silver cup.
sentences.chinese: 他因偷了一只银杯被那家饭店赶了出来。

sentences.english: And his Soul said to him, `Take that silver cup and hide it.
sentences.chinese: 灵魂便对他说，“拿走这银杯，把它藏起来。”

sentences.english: Where are you going to find room for another silver cup?
sentences.chinese: 你哪里去找到争取另一个银杯的机会呀？

definition: bejeweled nectar (idiom); ambrosia of the immortals/superb liquor/top quality wine
big/cup made of horn/horn wine container
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
